Description: Painted sycomore fig wood shabti of Khonsemheb with a blue flat-topped lappet wig, a brown face, the front of the body down to the crossed arms is painted yellow overlain with a representation of a blue and red collar and brown hands holding two red hoes, the front of the legs is inscribed with a central column of black painted hieroglyphs on a yellow ground flanked by blue lines, the rest of the leg-area is painted white at the front with a red line running down either edge, the back has a yellow seed-basket and a yoke with two nu-pots, the feet are differentiated by a groove.
